AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Dwarf pathfinder
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] spent [PAWN_possessive] early years, as many dwarf-children do, aiding the miners. [PAWN_pronoun] used [PAWN_possessive] smaller body to crawl through narrow openings to find pathways through tunnels, both new and old, that led to precious minerals.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Dwarf refugee
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: Torn from [PAWN_possessive] home at an early age, [PAWN_nameDef] had to grow up sooner rather than later.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Dwarf guarded child
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: As a child, [PAWN_nameDef] spent [PAWN_possessive] childhood under incredible care and watchful eyes. [PAWN_possessive] parents made sure no harm or conflict came to [PAWN_objective].

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Dwarf warrior family
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: Growing up with a family of warriors gave [PAWN_nameDef] a lot of practice wrestling, playing with toy weapons, and firing slingshots. Books were rarely on the table, however.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Dwarf miner
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a miner. [PAWN_pronoun] was instrumental in carving out the mountain fortresses of the dwarf-kingdoms.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Dwarf blacksmith
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a master craftsman renowned among the Free Peoples of the World for [PAWN_possessive] masterwork weapons and armor.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Dwarf forager
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: As a forager, [PAWN_nameDef] would have to leave the stronghold in order to forage and hunt for food on the mountainsides.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Dwarf soldier
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] served as a soldier for his stronghold. [PAWN_pronoun] learned to use the axe and bow with precision, which helped [PAWN_objective] built a career defending the stronghold against outside threats.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Dwarf noble
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef]'s family line extended from the dwarf-lords of old. Other dwarves followed [PAWN_possessive] orders without question, and [PAWN_pronoun] always got [PAWN_possessive] drinks for free.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Dwarf adventurer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was an adventurer. [PAWN_pronoun] left [PAWN_possessive] stronghold in order to pursue wealth and fame throughout the world. [PAWN_pronoun] learned the true value of treasure in [PAWN_possessive] travels, and came away with excellent bartering skills.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Dwarf delver
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was an adventurer. [PAWN_pronoun] left [PAWN_possessive] stronghold in order to pursue wealth and fame throughout the world. [PAWN_pronoun] learned the true value of treasure in [PAWN_possessive] travels, and came away with excellent bartering skills.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Dwarf toymaker
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: A dwarf who loves to spread joy to little children, [PAWN_nameDef] has dedicated [PAWN_possessive] art to toymaking.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Dwarf brewmaster
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: If there is one thing dwarves love most in this world, it's ale. [PAWN_nameDef] provides.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Dwarf cook
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] provides all [PAWN_possessive] kin with meals hot and ready like freshly forged steel. [PAWN_possessive] expertise with hammering out dough is renowned in the halls of the underground kingdoms.
